name: Oronjo WordPress Plugin
author: orangewise

sections.description:
Please switch to our new plugin Sell Content with Oronjo which is 100% compatible with the Oronjo WordPress Plugin. If you use our new Sell Content plugin, you can safely remove the Oronjo WordPress Plugin.

Oronjo is an e-commerce platform for selling digital downloads directly to your audience. Upload and sell ebooks, videos, music, comics, design or anything else digital you create. Oronjo will list your products and automatically deliver them to customers after the purchase.

  • The Oronjo WordPress Plug allows you to easily import/update your Oronjo products into your WordPress blog/site. The Oronjo plugin makes selling your intangibles super easy!
  • With Oronjo you can your digital products on your weblog; chapters of your novel; your best MP3 mixes; your thesis; Hi-res versions of your photos; or your homemade movies.
  • There is no need for a secure section on your site, the checkout is handled by Oronjo.
  • Get your free Oronjo account today: Oronjo Signup

Features

Please switch to our new plugin Sell Content with Oronjo which is 100% compatible with the Oronjo WordPress Plugin. If you use our new Sell Content plugin, you can safely remove the Oronjo WordPress Plugin.

  • Connect with most popular payment methods – PayPal and Bitcoins;
  • We do not limit total storage, bandwidth and you can have unlimited number of products

Contact

Suggestion, fixes, rants, congratulations, gifts et al to ro[at]oronjo.nl
sections.installation:
Please switch to our new plugin Sell Content with Oronjo which is 100% compatible with the Oronjo WordPress Plugin. If you use our new Sell Content plugin, you can safely remove the Oronjo WordPress Plugin.

  1. Search for ‘OronjoWordpressPlugin’ in your plugin menu in the WordPress dashboard, install and activate.
  2. Setup the plugin through the ‘Settings > Oronjo Plugin’ > menu in WordPress

or

  1. Download the plugin and unzip it.
  2. Upload the folder oronjowordpressplugin/ to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Setup the plugin through the ‘Settings > Oronjo Plugin’ > menu in WordPress
  5. Installation finished.

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Please switch to our new plugin Sell Content with Oronjo which is 100% compatible with the Oronjo WordPress Plugin. If you use our new Sell Content plugin, you can safely remove the Oronjo WordPress Plugin.

  1. Search for ‘OronjoWordpressPlugin’ in your plugin menu in the WordPress dashboard, install and activate.
  2. Setup the plugin through the ‘Settings > Oronjo Plugin’ > menu in WordPress

or

  1. Download the plugin and unzip it.
  2. Upload the folder oronjowordpressplugin/ to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Setup the plugin through the ‘Settings > Oronjo Plugin’ > menu in WordPress
  5. Installation finished.

short_description: The Oronjo Wordpress Plugin allows you to easily import/update your Oronjo products into Wordpress. Sell digital products, sell downloads with Oronjo.
